situation.title: Theater
situation.meta_description: Theatre and other artistic performances are prohibited.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

Theatre and other artistic performances are prohibited. This restriction applies to performances both outdoors and indoors. However, it does not apply to rehearsals, that can take place, but it is necessary to follow the ban of no singing in a closed space with more than 5 people. The reason being that singing is significantly risky regarding the spread of the virus and there is a high spread of respiratory droplets.

This ban has significantly affected the economic situation of theatres, actors, and other staff. Compensation for the effects of these measures is intended to mitigate this intervention.

See more: Compensation section.

questions_answers.question: Can I organise a theatre performane outdoors?
questions_answers.value: No, performances outdoors are also prohibited.
